briefTitle: Telemental Health and Cognitive Processing Therapy for Rural Combat Veterans With Posttraumatic Stress Disorder
officialTitle: Telemental Health and Cognitive Processing Therapy for Rural Combat Veterans With PTSD
summary: The immediate objective of this project was to evaluate the clinical effectiveness of a telemental health modality (video-teleconferencing) for providing an evidence-based group intervention (Cognitive Processing Therapy; CPT) to rural OIF/OEF Reservists, National Guardsmen, and veterans suffering with PTSD.

primaryOutcome.measure: Clinician Administered PTSD Scale, for DSM-IV (CAPS IV)
